thread.title: BRIEF-Marathon Partners Says Glass Lewis Joined ISS Against J. Alexander's Proposed Acquisition

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Marathon Partners Says Glass Lewis Joined ISS Against J. Alexander's Proposed Acquisition

organizations.name: brief-marathon partners says glass lewis joined iss against j. alexander

text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - J Alexanders Holdings Inc:
* MARATHON PARTNERS PLEASED THAT GLASS LEWIS HAS JOINED ISS IN RECOMMENDING AGAINST J. ALEXANDER‘S PROPOSED ACQUISITION OF 99 RESTAURANTS
* MARATHON PARTNERS EQUITY MANAGEMENT - CONTINUE TO REQUEST THAT J. ALEXANDER‘S BOARD DISCLOSE ADDITIONAL FINANCIAL INFORMATION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
